description.zh-cn: 中国近代京剧表演艺术家，京剧“四大名旦”之首，梅派艺术创始人。
description.en: A modern Chinese Peking Opera artist, leader of the "Four Great Dan", and founder of the Mei School of artistic style.

description.zh-cn: 梅兰芳的元配夫人。
description.en: The first wife of Mei Lanfang.

description.zh-cn: 京剧旦角演员，梅兰芳的平妻。
description.en: A Peking Opera Dan actress and the second wife (pingqi) of Mei Lanfang.

description.zh-cn: 京剧老生演员，曾与梅兰芳有过一段未获家族承认的婚姻关系。
description.en: A Peking Opera Laosheng actress who had a relationship with Mei Lanfang that was not recognized by his family.

description.zh-cn: 梅兰芳的幼子，梅派艺术的传人。
description.en: The youngest son of Mei Lanfang and an heir to the Mei School of Peking Opera.

description.zh-cn: 梅兰芳的父亲。
description.en: Father of Mei Lanfang.

description.zh-cn: 梅兰芳的母亲。
description.en: Mother of Mei Lanfang.

description.zh-cn: 北京著名青衣花旦演员，梅兰芳的祖父。
description.en: A famous Qingyi and Huadan actor in Beijing, and the grandfather of Mei Lanfang.

description.zh-cn: “同光十三绝”之一的青衣演员，梅兰芳的开蒙老师。
description.en: A Qingyi actor, one of the "Thirteen Greats of the Tongzhi-Guangxu Era", and Mei Lanfang's first teacher.

description.zh-cn: 中国画家，曾教梅兰芳画工虫。
description.en: A Chinese painter who taught Mei Lanfang how to paint insects.

description.zh-cn: 戏曲理论家，梅兰芳的良师益友，介绍梅兰芳与齐白石相识。
description.en: An opera theorist, a good teacher and helpful friend to Mei Lanfang, who introduced Mei to Qi Baishi.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人，十分赏识梅兰芳的艺术。
description.en: A key founder and leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who greatly admired Mei Lanfang's art.

en: Reorganized National Government of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫在中国抗日战争期间成立的亲日政府，曾力邀梅兰芳演出但遭拒绝。
description.en: A pro-Japanese government established by Wang Jingwei during the Second Sino-Japanese War, which invited Mei Lanfang to perform, but was refused.

description.zh-cn: 标志着第二次世界大战结束的事件，此后梅兰芳得以重返舞台。
description.en: The event that marked the end of World War II, after which Mei Lanfang was able to return to the stage.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第一届最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The first session of the highest state authority of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 由梅兰芳创立的京剧旦角表演艺术流派。
description.en: A school of Peking Opera Dan role performance art founded by Mei Lanfang.

description.zh-cn: 民国时期京剧四个旦角行当的代表演员的合称，包括梅兰芳、程砚秋、尚小云、荀慧生。
description.en: A collective name for four representative Dan role actors of Peking Opera during the Republican era, including Mei Lanfang, Cheng Yanqiu, Shang Xiaoyun, and Xun Huisheng.

description.zh-cn: 京剧“四大名旦”之一，梅兰芳的学生。
description.en: One of the "Four Great Dan" of Peking Opera and a student of Mei Lanfang.

description.zh-cn: 京剧“四大名旦”之一。
description.en: One of the "Four Great Dan" of Peking Opera.

description.zh-cn: 京剧“四大名旦”之一。
description.en: One of the "Four Great Dan" of Peking Opera.

description.zh-cn: 王明华是梅兰芳的元配夫人。
description.en: Wang Minghua was Mei Lanfang's first wife.

description.zh-cn: 福芝芳是梅兰芳的平妻。
description.en: Fu Zhifang was Mei Lanfang's second wife (pingqi).

description.zh-cn: 梅兰芳与孟小冬有过一段情缘，但此关系未获梅家承认，孟小冬被视为外室。
description.en: Mei Lanfang had a romantic relationship with Meng Xiaodong, but it was not recognized by his family, and Meng was considered his concubine.

description.zh-cn: 梅葆玖是梅兰芳的第五子。
description.en: Mei Baojiu was the fifth son of Mei Lanfang.

description.zh-cn: 梅葆玖是福芝芳所生。
description.en: Mei Baojiu was the son of Fu Zhifang.

description.zh-cn: 梅竹芬是梅兰芳的父亲。
description.en: Mei Zhufen was the father of Mei Lanfang.

description.zh-cn: 杨长玉是梅兰芳的母亲。
description.en: Yang Changyu was the mother of Mei Lanfang.

description.zh-cn: 梅巧玲是梅兰芳的祖父。
description.en: Mei Qiaoling was the grandfather of Mei Lanfang.

description.zh-cn: 1902年起，梅兰芳师从吴菱仙学戏。
description.en: Starting in 1902, Mei Lanfang studied opera under Wu Lingxian.

description.zh-cn: 1924年，梅兰芳拜师齐白石学画工虫。
description.en: In 1924, Mei Lanfang became a student of Qi Baishi to learn insect painting.

description.zh-cn: 齐如山是梅兰芳的良师益友。
description.en: Qi Rushan was a good teacher and helpful friend to Mei Lanfang.

description.zh-cn: 1920年，由齐如山介绍，梅兰芳与齐白石相识，后结为师友。
description.en: In 1920, introduced by Qi Rushan, Mei Lanfang met Qi Baishi, and they later became teacher and friend.

description.zh-cn: 梅兰芳得到中共领导人毛泽东的赏识，毛泽东甚至称呼他为“梅老板”。
description.en: Mei Lanfang was admired by the Communist Party leader Mao Zedong, who even addressed him as "Boss Mei".

description.zh-cn: 梅兰芳拒绝为汪精卫政府演出，并蓄须明志，导致在此期间经济来源断绝。
description.en: Mei Lanfang refused to perform for the Wang Jingwei government and grew a beard to show his resolve, which cut off his source of income during this period.

description.zh-cn: 1945年日本投降后，梅兰芳于10月重出舞台。
description.en: After Japan's surrender in 1945, Mei Lanfang returned to the stage in October.

description.zh-cn: 梅兰芳创造了具有独特风格的表演艺术流派——梅派。
description.en: Mei Lanfang created a unique style of performance art school - the Mei School.
